messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I will continue to stand up for Tottenham here in Westminster, as I have done persistently over the past 15 years, even when the riots hit our streets in 2011.

messages.title: Protecting the NHS
messages.content: Our NHS should always be there for you and your family when you need it most. Under this Government we have seen GP waiting times soar... A Labour Government will secure 20,000 more nurses, and 8,000 extra GPs to ensure we all have access to high quality healthcare, free at the point of delivery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour government will deliver 200,000 new homes a year for hard-working families by 2020 and truly tackle the housing crisis.
Criticizes the current government for betraying young people and pledges to invest over Â£170 million to support youth programmes in Tottenham.
Proposes to counteract soaring GP waiting times with a commitment to 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 extra GPs.

issues.health: Our NHS should always be there for you and your family... A Labour Government will secure 20,000 more nurses, and 8,000 extra GPs to ensure we all have access to high quality healthcare, free at the point of delivery.

housing.content: A Labour government will deliver 200,000 new homes a year for hard-working families by 2020 and truly tackle the housing crisis.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been proud to serve as your Labour Member of Parliament for the past 15 years. I am determined to tackle the housing crisis crippling our communities...

politicalExperience.achievements: Tackling the housing crisis, protecting the NHS, calling for rent control and longer fixed term tenancies

contactInformation.address: Unit 2, Carbery Enterprise Park, London, N17 0QP

images.caption: David Lammy - Labour's candidate for Tottenham.
